title: Swiss Roll and Swiss-Hole Reduction
description: This lab compares two popular non-linear dimensionality techniques, Locally Linear Embedding (LLE) and T-distributed Stochastic Neighbor Embedding (t-SNE), on the classic Swiss Roll dataset. We will explore how they both deal with the addition of a hole in the data.

meta.title: Exploring Dimensionality Reduction Techniques on Swiss Roll Data
meta.description: Dive into the world of non-linear dimensionality reduction with Locally Linear Embedding (LLE) and T-distributed Stochastic Neighbor Embedding (t-SNE) on the classic Swiss Roll dataset.
meta.keywords: dimensionality reduction, LLE, t-SNE, Swiss Roll, data visualization
